title: SCP-088-IT
content:
[[Module CSS]]
.email {border: solid 2px #000000; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 50px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}
.tofrom {margin-left: 10px; margin-top: 5px; padding: 1px 15px; border-left: solid 3px maroon}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]

/* Wilson's Divs */

/* Wilson's Divs placed outside supports @supports(--css:variables) to ensure most crucial part of theme remains visually intact if fallback occurs. */

div.wilson-border {
    border: 0.063em solid rgb(102, 87, 49);  
    box-shadow: 0em 0.063em 0.125em rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

div.wilson-header {
    color: white;
    background: rgb(163, 193, 98);
    padding: 1em;
    font-size: 150%;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: center;
}

div.wilson-subtitle {
    color: rgb(102, 87, 49);
    background: rgba(200, 226, 147);
    padding: 0.313em;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

div.wilson-body {
    color: rgba(102, 87, 49);
    background: rgb(209, 237, 154);
    padding: 1em;
}

[[/module]]


[[include info:start]]
Article: SCP-008-IT -- AILUROPHOBIA
Author: [[*user yessss]]
Original: [http://fondazionescp.wikidot.com/scp-088-it| SCP-088-IT]
Translator: [[*user Drss Selene]]
[[include info:end]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |hover-enlarge=--]
|enlarge-amount=6
|speed=250
|float=true
|align=right
|width=300px
|url=https://i.postimg.cc/VNRcDfFG/IMG-8250.png
|add-caption=true
|caption=Physical Game Cover.
]]

**Item #:** SCP-088-IT

**Object Class:** Safe

**Special Containment Procedures:** Following the understanding of the anomalous effects of the element and the subsequent destruction of all its physical copies except for one, now preserved inside a locker at [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/siti-italiani#toc5 Site Minerva], the object isn't considered to represent a risk for the Foundation. The access to the physical  copy of SCP-088-IT is allowed only with prior authorization from authorized level 3 or above personnel; the only copy that can be used is the [http://siddobox.wikidot.com/local--files/it-drss-selene/thecatgameint.html digital version] (being freed from every cognitive effect).

**Description:** The SCP-088-IT designation denominates the physical copies of a PC game called "THE CAT GAME"; the game doesn't present any kind of plot  but is exclusively composed of a progression system based on choices made by the player. Independently of the choices made, the result will be always the same. The game appears made up of three parts, named respectively:


* ##orange|Read the hero ledger:## in this first game phase the player will have to choose between four different heroes (portraying three cats and one dog) whose images have proven to be free of any anomalous effect;
* ##gray|Decide what to bring with your hero:## in this second phase the player will have to choose the objects to use during the adventure. The objecs are divided in three classes, based on their nature (Food, Potion, Weapon);
* ##470A00 |Test your deck:## in this last phase, the memetic nature of the object will be revealed when a //Felis catus silvestris// (similar to the cat on the cover of the game) image appears on the screen.



The SCP-088-IT effects manifest themselves following viewing of the aforementioned image for a time of no less than 30 seconds, producing the following symptoms:

||~ **Time elapsed since infection**||~ **Symptoms**|||||
||15-20 hours||Appearance of an acute form of Ailurophobia[[footnote]] Ailurophobia is the irrational and persistent fear of cats.[[/footnote]].||
|| 1 week||Appearance of two red-coated cats (defined SCP-088-IT-1), similar to those present on the cover of the game, within the subject's dreams.||
||1 month||Appearance in reality of two cats (defined as SCP-088-IT-2), visible only by the subject, with gray and white fur similar to those present on the cover of the video game.||
||3 months||Appearance in reality of a cat (defined SCP-088-IT-3), of aesthetic aspect and species similar to those of the specimen depicted on the cover of the video game.||

After a period of more than 3 months the subject will kill the instance and then commit suicide through the same methodology adopted to kill SCP-088-3.

[[include component:image-block name= https://i.postimg.cc/2SnYLFLf/IMG-8251.jpg|caption=One of the drawings recovered.|width=220px]]

The first suicide case linked with certainty to SCP-088-IT was â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ, researcher at [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/siti-italiani#toc3 Site Deus]. As highlighted from some found drawings in the researcher's office and from some contents of his messages, the researcher appeared to be obsessed by feline species. Every hypothesis formulated came to fruition thanks to the discovery of a physical copy of SCP-088-IT, hidden inside the researcher's office (at the moment it is thought that apart from â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ there were no other victims within the Foundation, however additional investigations are underway (both at the Italian Branch and at the foreign Branches).

During the inspection of the researcher's PC and personal effects, the following chats where found coming from private messages on a forum linked to [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/groups-of-interest#gamers-against-weed Gamer Against Weed] (GAW).

[[collapsible show="â–¶ Wolf ( â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ 's alter ego) and Hila chat." hide=" â–¼ Wolf ( â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ 's alter ego) and Hila chat."]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[div class="email"]]
------
**10/02/2020**
------
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
What have you done? He wants your head, I told you to not say that thing to anyone.
------
**10:56 10/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##orange|**Wolf**##
------
What the heck do you think I was supposed to do?? Keep quiet after what he did? Did you think that when it was found out we would have been safe? That nobody would ask themself some questions about why we remained silent?
------
**10:56 10/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
I don't think so but in the meantime I wouldn't have gone and told everyone what he did in the main forum, since his friends are there too.
------
**10:57 10/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
I'll try to make him reason but he will kills us as minimum
------
**10:57 10/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##orange|**Wolf**##
------
That guy killed a person by mistake; what do you think he could do to us?
------
**10:57 10/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
In the meantime that little runt is reaching the heights of power while we are still here sending memes each other (not that I mind).
------
**10:58 10/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##orange|**Wolf**##
------
You're the usual funny girl, see you in a few days, write to me when you will talk to him.
------
**11:00 10/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
------
**20/02/2020**
------
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
Hey Wolf, I spoke with him.
------
**14:00 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##orange|**Wolf**##
------
What did he say, anyway?

I wanted to write you earlier but I had some problems at work, I'm sorry..
------
**14:20 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
Whatever, the problem at work it might be your presence, I'm sending to you the screenshot of what he said.

------
**14:22 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |hover-enlarge=--]
|enlarge-amount=6
|speed=250
|float=true
|align=center
|width=300px
|url=http://scpsandboxit.wikidot.com/local--files/drs-selene-pagina-traduzioni-un-po-sballate/whathesaidtome-scp-088-it.PNG
|add-caption=true
|caption=Here's what he said to me
]]
------
**14:23 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##orange|**Wolf**##
------
An exemplary punishment, who does he thinks to be? In addittion to the nightmares now I have also to think about this person, I wonder why every jinx has to happen to me.

------
**14:23 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##black|**Hila**##
------
Maybe because you're the cause of your own jinxes?
What happened with your cat? it feels as if i'm seeing again what happened to BR-7274.

------
**14:24 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##orange|**Wolf**##
------
I couldn't be calm anymore because of his presence, I think it's a form of ailurophobia you know?

Now I have to go back to work, I'll write to you in a few day so we can finish talking.
------
**14:24 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
See you Wolf:).

------
**14:25 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |hover-enlarge=--]
|enlarge-amount=6
|speed=250
|float=true
|align=center
|width=300px
|url=https://i.postimg.cc/3wFmMyft/IMG-5825.png
|add-caption=true
|caption= UHH HOW SCARY, CATS
]]
------
**14:00 20/02/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
------
**1/03/2020**
------
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
If I had to wait for you I'd die of old age, glad that I never accepted to go out with you HAHA.

------
**11:00 1/03/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
------
**11/03/2020**
------
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
Btw the funny guy sent me a game by mail, kinda shit it remind me the one that he sent you some months ago.

------
**17:00 11/03/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##orange|**Wolf**##
------
Sorry Hila it's been a difficult period. Could you say to me again where you found the cats?

------
**18:00 11/03/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
Have you crossed the three after death reigns  like Dante before replying to me?

I don't remember much of that day but we were hanging out in the woods and he, to be like a tough guy, took a cat to bring it at home. Why?
------
**18:03 11/03/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##orange|**Wolf**##
------
Nothing, just wanted to know, see you as soon I can.

------
**18:03 11/03/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
Whatever I wanted to chat a bit but bye.

------
**18:04 11/03/2020**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
------
**20/05/2020**
------
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
##green|**Hila**##
------
I'm starting to have nightmares with cats too...

I hope you're okay even if you don't write me anymoreðŸ’”.
------
**8:37 20/05/2020**
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

It appeares that the subject nicknamed Hila (whose true identity is still unknown to the Foundation) died within three months of this conversation

[[div class="wilson-body"]]
**Addendum 088:** [http://fondazionescp.wikidot.com/wilson-s-wildlife-solutions-hub Wilson's Wildlife Solutions] report.
------
On [REDACTED] date, the [http://fondazionescp.wikidot.com/wilson-s-wildlife-solutions-hub Wilson's Wildlife Solutions] (WWS) sent the following report to the Foundation:
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[collapsible show=" â–¶ Creature Profile: Essi!" hide=" â–¼ Creature Profile: Essi!"]]
[[div class="wilson-border"]]
[[div style="color:white; background: #a3c162;padding: 15px;"]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]**Creature Profile: Essi!**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
[[>]]
**Summary!**
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
**Summary!**

**Name:** Essi.

**Species:** //Felis catus// (Domestic Cat).

**Main Carer:** Jack Davis, Terrestrial Team.

**Diet:** Various types of meat (usually cat colonies provide their own food).

**Accommodation:** Outside of the structure.


[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
[[>]]
**Creature Characteristics!**
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
[[f<image https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/94/Ruined_building%2C_Barr_-_geograph.org.uk_-_2022462.jpg/640px-Ruined_building%2C_Barr_-_geograph.org.uk_-_2022462.jpg width="300px" style="border:1px solid #665731;"  title="Colony 1 place."]]

The colonies of Essi specimens are made of Felis Cattus specimens with a marked territoriality. There are a total of sixty-one specimens, of which twenty-one in colony 1, fifteen in colony 2, and twenty-three in colony 3.

Cat colonies are organized on a social hierarchy based on the coat pigmentation:

- ##black|Black##: identifiable as the Alpha cat. There are a maximum of two specimens per colony and they are exclusively male. From his union with an inferior female cat, a male cat identical to his father will always be generated;

- ##orange|Orange##: identifiable as Beta cat (in variable number per colony). Variable sex, their defense function is the marking of territory;

- ##gray|Gray##: identifiable as Beta cats (in variable number per colony). Exclusively of female sex, their main function is hunting small sized animals similarly to the other same speciment prey;

- ##470A00 |Brown##: identifiable as Gamma cats (in variable number per colony). Doesn't have a defined function.
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
[[>]]
**History!**
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]

The first cat colony was discovered in 2011. The discovery of a second and third colony dates back to 2013. A series of photos were taken as documentation of the discovery.

It is hypothesized that the nightmares generated by the visual representations of Essi's exemplars, similar to the representations themselves, possess the ability to generate significant mental alterations in the viewers.The suicide of agent Brooke Burton, who was responsible for collecting photographic images of the Essi colonies, would seem to represent evidence in support of this hypothesis. For this reason, the taken photos are now archived and it is prohibited to take any more.

During an inspection in 2017, carried out following a storm in the area, it was discovered that one of the Alpha cats from colony 2 had disappeared.

[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
[[>]]
**Special Needs and Habitat!**
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
 
The three colonies do not need any external help, except in cases where their safety is put at risk; it is necessary to ensure that no digital images of the specimens can circulate online. If this were to happen, Jack Davis must be notified as soon as possible; he will then institute a joint search with Foundation forces.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: Tim Wilson
Recipient: everyone
Date: 10/02/2020
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
Dear colleagues,

Following the recent events involving the Foundation, any information we have regarding the cat colonies will be shared with them.

I ask you all to pay more attention to the three cat colonies to prevent other cats from being kidnapped or photographed and cause other tragedies similar to the one that occurred in 2017.

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

Following the information collected, a collaboration deal has been make with [http://fondazionescp.wikidot.com/wilson-s-wildlife-solutions-hub WWS], with the purpose of tracing any other specimens that may have escaped containment.

[[/=]]
